title: Mark Vardy and The School of Ninjas: A Children's Martial Arts and Action Adventure Novel
description: Step into a world of action and adventure, where children are highly trained martial arts warriors pitched in deadly battle against evil ninjas.Mark Vardy is a boy on a mission - to follow in his policeman father's footsteps and train at the elite Academy of Martial Arts, hidden in the depths of England's New Forest. Mark and his friends train with mysterious Senseis, learning the secrets of the martial arts and honing their skills and spirit for future adventures.In a series of challenges, Mark's skills and character are put to the test. When his future, dreams and ambitions are at stake, can Mark keep his commitment to doing the right thing? And when the loyalty of friends is tested, which of his fellow warriors-in-training will remain at his side? Will the Warriors of Light from the Academy be victorious over the dark ninjas of Shadowlands School of Ninjas? Will Mark and his friends become the next generation of heroes?Mark Vardy and the School of Ninjas is a boldly written, fast-paced read for all the family that reinforces the value of friendship, self-discipline, and doing the right thing.
author: C.J.T. Wilkins
